definition[0]: to make small changes to something in order to repair it or make it work better
example[0]: Congress has been tinkering with the legislation.
example[1]: Dad was always tinkering around with engines.
definition[1]: in the past, a tinker was someone who travelled from place to place selling things or repairing metal pots, pans etc
definition[2]: a disobedient or annoying young child
